topic.title: Registration
topic.section:
Once set by the Conference Manager, information about Registration can be viewed under Policies on About the Conference page.

Registration Types. Click on Registration under Current Conferences, and on "Registration Types" on Registration page, then on the subsequent Registration Types page select "Create New Registration Type". In addition to details of new registration type itself, other settings include dates for opening and closing of registration, access options for online access, physical access, or both, and authentication options to limit acccess to registrants.

Registration Policies. Registration Manager can be indicated. And additional registration information can be added. Registration expiry reminders can also be configured; however, Site Administrator need to be consulted for activating these options. In addition to Author Self-Archiving, Delayed Open Access is provided for registration conferences, with the consultation of the Site Administrator to activate as well.
